package.name: pioneernet
package.description: The pioneernet package. Contains nodes to (1) control the Pioneer with a UESMANN network, by reading/writing the pioneer topics (which can come from the robot or from the Gazebo sim; (2) connect to the Pioneer by UDP, forming the local side of a ROS/ARIA bridge - UDP packets are read and converted to ROS topic publications, and ROS motor control topics are read and resent to the Pioneer over UDP.
